title: San Andreas fault
creator_credit: Bert Van Bork, American Geological Institute and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Presents evidence of geological forces at work relating to the causes of earthquakes. Describes the scientific methods used to study current seismic activity in the San Andreas Fault in California.
